Remarks about the datasets:

  * The datasets in the online demonstration of the Information Workbench may not be completely coherent with the actual live data that is accessible via the SPARQL endpoint. Consequently result sets might differ, e.g. in the queries accessing the nytimes data stores.
  * The Information Workbench store does not contain the geonames dataset, hence Q1.6 and Q1.7 cannot be demoed online.
  * The current online demonstration of the Information Workbench integrates all English DBpedia datasets as of version 3.5.1.
  * The primary download server for the KEGG dataset seems to be down at the moment. A secondary source can be found at:  ftp://ftp.genome.jp/pub/kegg/release/current/ and http://cheminfov.informatics.indiana.edu:8080/download/

= Queries =

== Generic Domain Queries ==

Queries 1.1 through 1.7 are queries for the cross domain datasets and for convenience the following prefixes are used:

  * *rdf:* <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
  * *owl:* <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
  * *dbpedia:* <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
  * *dbpedia-owl:* <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
  * *nytimes:* <http://data.nytimes.com/elements/>
  * *foaf:* <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
  * *purl:* <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
  * *linkedmdb:* <http://data.linkedmdb.org/resource/movie/>
  * *geonames:* <http://www.geonames.org/ontology#>

Note that all queries can be downloaded in the Download section.

 * *Query 1.1:* Find all information about Barack Obama.

{{{
SELECT ?predicate ?object WHERE {
   { dbpedia:Barack_Obama ?predicate ?object }
  UNION
   { ?subject owl:sameAs dbpedia:Barack_Obama .
     ?subject ?predicate ?object } }
}}}

   [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%3Fpredicate%20%3Fobject%20WHERE%20%7B%20%20%20%20%7B%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FBarack_Obama%3E%20%3Fpredicate%20%3Fobject%20%7D%20%20%20UNION%20%20%20%20%7B%20%3Fsubject%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FBarack_Obama%3E%20.%20%20%20%20%20%20%3Fsubject%20%3Fpredicate%20%3Fobject%20%7D%20%7D Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.2:* Return Barack Obama's party membership and news pages.

{{{
SELECT ?party ?page WHERE {
   dbpedia:Barack_Obama dbpedia-owl:party ?party .
   ?x nytimes:topicPage ?page .
   ?x owl:sameAs dbpedia:Barack_Obama }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%3Fparty%20%3Fpage%20%20WHERE%20%7B%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FBarack_Obama%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2Fparty%3E%20%3Fparty%20.%20%3Fx%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.nytimes.com%2Felements%2FtopicPage%3E%20%3Fpage%20.%20%3Fx%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FBarack_Obama%3E%20.%20%7D Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.3:* Return for all US presidents their party membership and news pages about them.

{{{
SELECT ?pres ?party ?page WHERE {
   ?pres rdf:type dbpedia-owl:President .
   ?pres dbpedia-owl:nationality dbpedia:United_States .
   ?pres dbpedia-owl:party ?party .
   ?x nytimes:topicPage ?page .
   ?x owl:sameAs ?pres }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%3Fpres%20%3Fparty%20%3Fpage%20WHERE%20%7B%20%20%20%20%3Fpres%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FPresident%3E%20.%20%20%20%20%3Fpres%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2Fnationality%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FUnited_States%3E%20.%20%20%20%20%3Fpres%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2Fparty%3E%20%3Fparty%20.%20%20%20%20%3Fx%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.nytimes.com%2Felements%2FtopicPage%3E%20%3Fpage%20.%20%20%20%20%3Fx%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E%20%3Fpres%20%7D Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.4:* Find all news about actors starring in a movie with name Tarzan.

{{{
SELECT ?actor ?news WHERE {
   ?film purl:title 'Tarzan' .
   ?film linkedMDB:actor ?actor .
   ?actor owl:sameAs ?x.
   ?y owl:sameAs ?x .
   ?y nytimes:topicPage ?news }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT+%3Factor+%3Fnews+WHERE+{+%3Ffilm+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fpurl.org%2Fdc%2Fterms%2Ftitle%3E+%27Tarzan%27+.+%3Ffilm+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.linkedmdb.org%2Fresource%2Fmovie%2Factor%3E+%3Factor+.+%3Factor+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Fx.+%3Fy+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Fx+.+%3Fy+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.nytimes.com%2Felements%2FtopicPage%3E+%3Fnews+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.5:* Find the director and the genre of movies directed by Italians.

{{{
SELECT ?film ?director ?genre WHERE {
   ?film dbpedia-owl:director ?director.
   ?director dbpedia-owl:nationality dbpedia:Italy .
   ?x owl:sameAs ?film .
   ?x linkedMDB:genre ?genre }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%3Ffilm%20%3Fdirector%20%3Fgenre%20WHERE%20%7B%20%20%20%20%3Ffilm%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2Fdirector%3E%20%20%3Fdirector.%20%20%20%20%3Fdirector%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2Fnationality%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FItaly%3E%20%20.%20%20%20%20%3Fx%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E%20%3Ffilm%20.%20%20%20%20%3Fx%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.linkedmdb.org%2Fresource%2Fmovie%2Fgenre%3E%20%3Fgenre%20%7D%0D%0A Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.6:* Find all musical artists based in Germany.

{{{
SELECT ?name ?location ?news WHERE {
   ?artist foaf:name ?name .
   ?artist foaf:based_near ?location .
   ?location geonames:parentFeature ?germany .
   ?germany geonames:name 'Federal Republic of Germany' }
}}}

  No demo available: Online Demo of Information Workbench does not provide geonames data

 * *Query 1.7:* Find all news about locations in the state of California.

{{{
SELECT ?location ?news WHERE {
   ?location geonames:parentFeature ?parent .
   ?parent geonames:name 'California'  .
   ?y owl:sameAs ?location.
   ?y nytimes:topicPage ?news }
}}}

  No demo available: Online Demo of Information Workbench does not provide geonames data

== Life Sciences Domain Queries ==

Queries 2.1 through 2.7 are queries for the life science domain datasets and for convenience the following prefixes are used:

  * *rdf:* <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
  * *owl:* <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
  * *drugbank:* <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugbank/>
  * *drugbank-drugs:* <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugs/>
  * *drugbank-category:* <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/drugbank/resource/drugcategory/>
  * *dbpedia-owl:* <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
  * *dbpedia-owl-drug:* <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/drug/>
  * *kegg:* <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/kegg#>
  * *chebi:* <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/bio2rdf#>
  * *purl:* <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
  * *bio2rdf:* <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/bio2rdf#>

Note that all queries can be downloaded in the Download section.

 * *Query 2.1:* Find all drugs from {\tt Drugbank} and {\tt DBpedia} with their melting points.

{{{
SELECT ?drug ?melt WHERE {
   { ?drug drugbank:meltingPoint ?melt . }
  UNION
   { ?drug dbpedia-owl-drug:meltingPoint ?melt . } }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%24drug%20%24melt%20WHERE%20%7B%0D%0A%20%20%20%20%7B%20%24drug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FmeltingPoint%3E%20%24melt.%20%7D%0D%0A%20%20%20%20UNION%0D%0A%20%20%20%20%7B%20%24drug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FDrug%2FmeltingPoint%3E%20%24melt%20.%20%7D%0D%0A%7D Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.2:* Find all properties of Caffeine in Drugbank. Find all entities from all available databases describing Caffeine, return the union of all properties of any of these entities.

{{{
SELECT ?predicate ?object WHERE {
   { drugbank-drugs:DB00201 ?predicate ?object . }
  UNION
   { drugbank-drugs:DB00201 owl:sameAs ?caff .
     ?caff ?predicate ?object . } }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%3Fpredicate%20%3Fobject%20WHERE%20%7B%20%20%20%20%7B%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugs%2FDB00201%3E%20%3Fpredicate%20%3Fobject%20.%20%7D%20%20%20UNION%20%20%20%20%7B%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugs%2FDB00201%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E%20%3Fcaff%20.%20%20%20%20%20%20%3Fcaff%20%3Fpredicate%20%3Fobject%20.%20%7D%20%7D%0D%0A Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.3:* For all drugs in DBpedia, find all drugs they interact with, along with an explanation of the interaction.

{{{
SELECT ?Drug ?IntDrug ?IntEffect WHERE {
   ?Drug rdf:type dbpedia-owl:Drug .
   ?y owl:sameAs ?Drug .
   ?Int drugbank:interactionDrug1 ?y .
   ?Int drugbank:interactionDrug2 ?IntDrug .
   ?Int drugbank:text ?IntEffect . }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%3FDrug%20%3FIntDrug%20%3FIntEffect%20WHERE%20%7B%0D%0A%20%20%20%20%3FDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FDrug%3E%20.%0D%0A%20%20%20%20%3Fy%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E%20%3FDrug%20.%0D%0A%20%20%20%20%3FInt%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FinteractionDrug1%3E%20%3Fy%20.%0D%0A%20%20%20%20%3FInt%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FinteractionDrug2%3E%20%3FIntDrug%20.%0D%0A%20%20%20%20%3FInt%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2Ftext%3E%20%3FIntEffect%20.%20%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.4:* Find all the equations of reactions related to drugs from category Cathartics and their drug description.

{{{
SELECT ?drugDesc ?cpd ?equation WHERE {
   ?drug drugbank:drugCategory drugbank-category:cathartics .
   ?drug drugbank:keggCompoundId ?cpd .
   ?drug drugbank:description ?drugDesc .
   ?enzyme kegg:xSubstrate ?cpd .
   ?enzyme rdf:type kegg:Enzyme .
   ?reaction kegg:xEnzyme ?enzyme .
   ?reaction kegg:equation ?equation . }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%3FdrugDesc%20%3Fcpd%20%3Fequation%20WHERE%20%7B%20%3Fdrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FdrugCategory%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugcategory%2Fcathartics%3E%20.%20%3Fdrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FkeggCompoundId%3E%20%3Fcpd%20.%20%3Fdrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2Fdescription%3E%20%3FdrugDesc%20.%20%3Fenzyme%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23xSubstrate%3E%20%3Fcpd%20.%20%3Fenzyme%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23Enzyme%3E%20.%20%3Freaction%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23xEnzyme%3E%20%3Fenzyme%20.%20%3Freaction%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23equation%3E%20%3Fequation%20.%20%7D%0D%0A Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.5:* Find all drugs from Drugbank, together with the URL of the corresponding page stored in KEGG and the URL to the image derived from ChEBI.

{{{
SELECT ?drug ?keggUrl ?chebiImage WHERE {
   ?drug rdf:type drugbank:drugs .
   ?drug drugbank:keggCompoundId ?keggDrug .
   ?keggDrug bio2rdf:url ?keggUrl .
   ?drug drugbank:genericName ?drugBankName .
   ?chebiDrug purl:title ?drugBankName .
   ?chebiDrug chebi:image ?chebiImage . }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%24drug%20%24keggUrl%20%24chebiImage%20WHERE%20%7B%0D%0A%20%20%24drug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2Fdrugs%3E%20.%0D%0A%20%20%24drug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FkeggCompoundId%3E%20%24keggDrug%20.%0D%0A%20%20%24keggDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23url%3E%20%24keggUrl%20.%0D%0A%20%20%24drug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FgenericName%3E%20%24drugBankName%20.%0D%0A%20%20%24chebiDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fpurl.org%2Fdc%2Felements%2F1.1%2Ftitle%3E%20%24drugBankName%20.%0D%0A%20%20%24chebiDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23image%3E%20%24chebiImage%20.%0D%0A%7D%20 Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.6:* Find KEGG drug names of all drugs in Drugbank belonging to category Micronutrient.

{{{
SELECT ?drug ?title WHERE {
   ?drug drugbank:drugCategory drugbank-category:micronutrient .
   ?drug drugbank:casRegistryNumber ?id .
   ?keggDrug rdf:type kegg:Drug .
   ?keggDrug bio2rdf:xRef ?id .
   ?keggDrug purl:title ?title . }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%3Fdrug%20%3Ftitle%20WHERE%20%7B%20%0D%0A%09%20%3Fdrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FdrugCategory%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugcategory%2Fmicronutrient%3E%20.%0D%0A%09%20%3Fdrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FcasRegistryNumber%3E%20%3Fid%20.%0D%0A%09%20%3FkeggDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23Drug%3E%20.%0D%0A%09%20%3FkeggDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23xRef%3E%20%3Fid%20.%0D%0A%09%20%3FkeggDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fpurl.org%2Fdc%2Felements%2F1.1%2Ftitle%3E%20%3Ftitle%20.%0D%0A%7D%20%20 Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.7:* Find all drugs that affect humans and mammals. For those having a description of their biotransformation, also return this description. Show only those whose mass starts with a number larger then 5.

{{{
SELECT ?drug ?transform ?mass WHERE {
   ?drug drugbank:affectedOrganism  'Humans and other mammals'.
   ?drug drugbank:casRegistryNumber ?cas .
   ?keggDrug bio2rdf:xRef ?cas .
   ?keggDrug bio2rdf:mass ?mass
      FILTER ( ?mass > '5' )
      OPTIONAL { ?drug drugbank:biotransformation ?transform . } }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search/?q=SELECT%20%24drug%20%24transform%20%24mass%20WHERE%20%7B%20%20%0D%0A%20%09%7B%20%24drug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FaffectedOrganism%3E%20%20'Humans%20and%20other%20mammals'.%0D%0A%20%09%20%20%24drug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FcasRegistryNumber%3E%20%24cas%20.%0D%0A%20%09%20%20%24keggDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23xRef%3E%20%24cas%20.%0D%0A%20%09%20%20%24keggDrug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23mass%3E%20%24mass%0D%0A%20%09%20%20%20%20%20%20FILTER%20(%20%24mass%20%3E%20'5'%20)%0D%0A%20%09%7D%20%0D%0A%20%09%20%20OPTIONAL%20%7B%20%24drug%20%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2Fbiotransformation%3E%20%24transform%20.%20%7D%20%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A Try this Query on our Information Workbench]
